v.v: Yahweh, I have great troubles, so I call out to you.
Yahweh, if you kept a record of the sins that we have committed,
Yahweh has said that he would help me;
I wait for Yahweh to help me
You, my fellow Israelites, confidently expect that Yahweh will bless us.
It is he who will save us Israelite people from being punished for all the sins that we have committed.

v: while I call out to you to have mercy on me!
not one of us would escape from being condemned and punished!
with the result that we have an awesome respect for you.
I trust what he said, and I wait eagerly for him to do that.
more than watchmen wait for the morning to come;
yes, I wait more eagerly than they do!
He will bless us because he has mercy on us,
and he is very willing to save us.
